nodes.text: Redda Macrebe was a male Human who served as a Rebel Alliance agent tasked with acquiring supplies. He was the center of a network of agents and had a vast network of contacts. He primarily operated within the Trax Tube space lane systems.

Little is know about Macrebe's life except that he was very efficient at his job. When faced with a request that might normally be unattainable, Macrebe was able to improvise by acquiring various parts that could be used to construct the needed equipment when the assembled equipment might not be readily available. During a mission in the Trax sector, he was able to supply Airen Cracken with all the necessary equipment for the mission to be completed successfully.
